snippet: A week after Ann Romney wore a cherry red Oscar de la Renta dress to deliver her speech at the Republican National Convention, the designer himself was being honored with a lifetime achievement award at Lincoln Center.
abstract: A week after Ann Romney wore a cherry red Oscar de la Renta dress to deliver her speech at the Republican National Convention, the designer himself was being honored with a lifetime achievement award at Lincoln Center.

headline.main: An Award for Oscar de la Renta
